definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
to wait/to inquire after/to watch/season/climate/(old) period of five days
won't get far/unlikely to be successful

pinyin: quan2 qiu2 qi4 hou4 sheng1 wen1
quan2 qiu2 qi4 hou4 bian4 nuan3

sentences.english: The Rapel Valley weather ripened fruit slowly , and Cabernet Sauvignon developed intense flavours.
sentences.chinese: 兰佩谷的气候使得葡萄成熟缓慢，并带有浓郁的香气。

sentences.english: Global warming caused a dryer and warmer climate in the centeral part of Qinghai-Tibet plateau.
sentences.chinese: 受全球变暖影响，青藏高原气候呈现出暖干趋势。

sentences.english: Football is played in all weathers, including rain and snow.
sentences.chinese: 可以在气候下玩橄榄球，包括雨天和雪天。

sentences.english: There is no solution to the question of climate change without forestry.
sentences.chinese: 如果不关注森林，那么气候变化问题就是无法解决的。

sentences.english: The Maldives comprises the equator and has a tropical climate.
sentences.chinese: 马尔代夫位于赤道附近，属热带气候。

sentences.english: Global average temperature records are vital to understanding how the climate is changing.
sentences.chinese: 全球平均气温纪录对认识气候变化的过程至关重要。

sentences.english: Weatherproof or explosion proof electric actuator.
sentences.chinese: 电动执行机构的气候保护或防爆保护。

sentences.english: The climate here is always hot, summer and winter alike .
sentences.chinese: 这里的气候总是那么热，夏季和冬季都一样。

sentences.english: The climate ecological character is evident between provenances.
sentences.chinese: 种源区具有明显的气候生态特征。

sentences.english: A changing climate is adding pressure to the already-stressed agricultural sector.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化正在增加农业部门已经承受的压力。

sentences.english: These clothes aren't really suited to a tropical climate.
sentences.chinese: 在热带气候区这种衣服实在不合适。

sentences.english: Droughts and forest fires are expected to increase due to climate change.
sentences.chinese: 由于气候变化，预计将会出现更多的干旱和林火。

sentences.english: Climate change and extreme weather events will further complicate the picture.
sentences.chinese: 气候变化和极端天气现象更使情况雪上加霜。

sentences.english: These negotiations matter hugely for the peak-oil debate.
sentences.chinese: 关于气候变化的协商对石油峰值讨论至关重要。

sentences.english: Oregon is projected to have more high-pressure days as the climate changes.
sentences.chinese: 随着气候的变化，俄勒冈州将会有更多的高压天气。
